titles.title: Andrew Carnegie Libraries for Lifelong Learning Act
To provide for public library construction and technology enhancement.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 11/16/1999--Introduced. Andrew Carnegie Libraries for Lifelong Learning Act - Amends the Library Services and Technology Act to require the Director of the Institute of Museum and Library Services to carry out a program of awarding grants to States for the construction or technology enhancement of public libraries. Authorizes appropriations.
